DOC.brief_summary: Evaluating the effectiveness of atypical antipsychotics in the community - a prospective, multicentre, observational study to evaluate the impact on Quality of Life of GP-based management of antipsychotic treatment in Belgium
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Anti-Psychotic in GPs Setting
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with Schizophrenia or Bipolar Disorder (currently in a manic episode)
DOC.keyword: Schizophrenia or Bipolar Disorder (currently in a manic episode)
